You are 1 of {{ registered }} citizens w: You are 1 of {{ registered }} citizens who are active citizen election reporters! {{ questions }} questions and {{ reports }} election activity posts have been submitted.
The VIP-Ask is a multi-channel political: The VIP-Ask is a multi-channel political engagement portal.VIP: Ask will engage South Africans from all walks of life to report on electoral activities,
voice their opinions on current issues s: voice their opinions on current issues surrounding the elections, and report on election processes on voting day.
VIP:Ask is a partnership between academi: VIP:Ask is a partnership between academics, Democracy International, Livity Africa and the Praekelt Foundation
